department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: National Master Standing Offers for marine fuels in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards
description: National Master Standing Offers for marine fuels in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards, as specified at Appendix "A"—Delivery to Quebec, Montreal, Salaberry-de-Valleyfield, and Lasalle, QC on an as requested basis from date of issuance of standing offer up to and including May 31, 2023. Quantity: various. Delivery Date: to be specified. Documents may be submitted in either the English or French language.
full_summary:
Government Invitation to Tender (GIT)
### Political Agreement
* WTO Government Procurement Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
### Requested Documents
Download the complete Trade Agreement GIT from the public link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/21/aa7deda2a30c5b7e9cdde24de6949881/ABES.PROD.PW__HL.B654.E81396.EBSU000.PDF

### Procurement Details
Title NMSO Marine Fuels 2021-2023
Reference Number PW-__HL-654-81396
Category Government Procurement - Open Bidding
A bid is open for procurement from all interested suppliers

### Procurement Details in English and French
**English**
* All interested contractors shall identify themselves by providing a business number in their quote.
*  Only accepted tender formats accepted will be binding agreements.
* Late submissions will not be accepted.

**French**
* Tous les fournisseurs intéressés doivent s’identifier en fournissant un numéro d’entreprise dans leur dossard.
* Seuls les formats de soumissions acceptés seront des engagements contraignants.
* Les soumissions sont versées trop tard ne seront pas acceptées

### Notice Details
**Official Tender Documents**
Official Documents in English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/21/a38cab41f30e42180cb36bf521f01f22/ABES.PROD.PW__HL.B654.F81396.EBSU000.PDF
Official Documents in English and French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/21/a38cab41f30e42180cb36bf521f01f22/ABES.PROD.PW__HL.B654.F81396.EBSU000.PDF

**Submit your bid**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites you to bid on a Contract related to:

Trade Agreement: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership CPTPP
Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
Competitive
